00009 // Endpoint editor widget for the IP-XACT component editor.

00011 
00012 #include "EndpointEditor.h"
00013 
00014 #include "EndpointDelegate.h"
00015 #include <models/component.h>
00016 
00017 #include <QVBoxLayout>
00018 #include <QHBoxLayout>
00019 #include <QHeaderView>
00020 #include <QIcon>
00021 
00022 EndpointEditor::EndpointEditor(QSharedPointer<Component> component,
00023                                void* dataPointer, QWidget *parent): 
00024 ItemEditor(component, parent), 
00025 addRowButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/add.png"), QString(), this),
00026 removeRowButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/remove.png"), QString(), this),
00027 view_(this), model_(dataPointer, this) {
00028 
00029     connect(&addRowButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00030         &model_, SLOT(onAddRow()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00031     connect(&removeRowButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00032         this, SLOT(onRemove()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00033     connect(&model_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00034         this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00035     connect(&model_, SIGNAL(dataChanged(const QModelIndex&, const QModelIndex&)),
00036         this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00037     connect(&model_, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00038         this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00039     connect(&model_, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00040         this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00041 
00042     // set view to be sortable
00043     view_.setSortingEnabled(true);
00044     view_.horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(QHeaderView::Stretch);
00045     view_.setSelectionMode(QAbstractItemView::SingleSelection);
00046     view_.setAlternatingRowColors(true);
00047     //view_.setSelectionBehavior(QAbstractItemView::SelectRows);
00048     view_.verticalHeader()->hide();
00049     view_.setEditTriggers(QAbstractItemView::AllEditTriggers);
00050     view_.setWordWrap(true);
00051 
00052     // set the delegate
00053     view_.setItemDelegate(new EndpointDelegate(this));
00054 
00055     // set proxy to do the sorting automatically
00056     proxy_ = new QSortFilterProxyModel(this);
00057 
00058     // set source model for proxy
00059     proxy_->setSourceModel(&model_);
00060     // set proxy to be the source for the view
00061     view_.setModel(proxy_);
00062 
00063     // sort the view
00064     view_.sortByColumn(0, Qt::AscendingOrder);
00065 
00066     QHBoxLayout* buttonLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
00067     buttonLayout->addWidget(&addRowButton_, 0, Qt::AlignLeft);
00068     buttonLayout->addWidget(&removeRowButton_, 0, Qt::AlignLeft);
00069     buttonLayout->addStretch();
00070 
00071     // create the layout, add widgets to it
00072     QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00073     layout->addWidget(&view_);
00074     layout->addLayout(buttonLayout);
00075 
00076     model_.restore();
00077 }
00078 
00079 EndpointEditor::~EndpointEditor() {
00080 }
00081 
00082 void EndpointEditor::onRemove() {
00083 
00084     QModelIndex index = proxy_->mapToSource(view_.currentIndex());
00085 
00086     // if index is valid then remove the row
00087     if (index.isValid())
00088         model_.onRemoveRow(index.row());
00089 }
00090 
00091 bool EndpointEditor::isValid() const {
00092     return model_.isValid();
00093 }
00094 
00095 void EndpointEditor::makeChanges() {
00096     model_.apply();
00097 }
